title: About Browncoat
description: Browncoat is a html, scss, and js framework. It provides a folder structure for assets, a configurable gulp setup, and internal styleguide creation.

sections.title: Start Here
sections.description: Go to the browncoat github page and download the zip package for the project.=>Unzip it and place the contents in your project folder.=>Open a terminal and perform the commands bellow.=>A browser window should automatically open to `localhost:3000` containing the same documentation for browncoat you would see at the online docs.

sections.title: Gulp Task Management
sections.description: After running `npm run gulp` a watch task will start. This watches all scss, js, and html files and triggers recompilling (of js and scss). Changes will also trigger browsersync which will stream the changes to the browser or when streaming is not available it will reload the browser so changes are immediately visible.

sections.title: HTML Wrapper Boilerplate
sections.description: HTML boilerplate to start prototyping with browncoat.
